gov.nasa.ial.mde.math
Class PointXY

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.ial.mde.math.PointXY

public class PointXY
extends Object

This class represents a point with double x and y values.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dr. Robert Shelton

Field Detail

x

public double x
The x value of the point.

y

public double y
The y value of the point.

Constructor Detail

PointXY

public PointXY(double[] xy)
Creates an instance of PointXY with the x and y point values specified by the xy array.

The x value is specified at array index 0.

The y value is specified at array index 1.

Parameters:
xy - the x and y point values specified in an array.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if the xy array length is not excatly 2.

PointXY

public PointXY(double x,
               double y)
Creates an instance of PointXY with the x and y point values specified.

Parameters:
x - the x value of the point.
y - the y value of the point.
Method Detail

translate

public void translate(double deltax,
                      double deltay)
Translates this point by the specified delta's in x and y.

Parameters:
deltax - the value to add to this points x value.
deltay - the value to add to this points y value.

newTranslatedPoint

public PointXY newTranslatedPoint(double deltax,
                                  double deltay)
Returns a new PointXY instance representing the translation of this point by the specified delta's in x and y.

Parameters:
deltax - the value to add to this points x value.
deltay - the value to add to this points y value.
Returns:
a new point representing the translation of this point by the specified delta's in x and y.

sum

public PointXY sum(PointXY p)
Returns a new PointXY instance representing the sum of this point and the specified point.

Parameters:
p - the point to add to the values of this point.
Returns:
a new PointXY instance representing the sum of this point and the specified point.

difference

public PointXY difference(PointXY p)
Returns a new PointXY instance representing the difference between this point and the specified point.

Parameters:
p - the point to subtract the values from this point.
Returns:
a new PointXY instance representing the difference between this point and the specified point.

dispose

public void dispose()
This method is called to dispose of resources used by this. PointXY. The PointXY will be invalid and must not be used once this method has been called.
